TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmRelationshipNavigationPropertyAttribute extends System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmPropertyAttribute

Docs.summary: Attribute that indicates that the property represents a navigation property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipNavigationPropertyAttribute> links the navigation property of a class to the navigation property of an entity type that is defined in the conceptual model.
This attribute is applied to the following types of navigation properties:
- Properties that return an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> of related objects.
- Properties that return the value of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> of a related object, as in the following example from the `SalesOrderDetail` type.

MemberSignature.Value: public EdmRelationshipNavigationPropertyAttribute (string relationshipNamespaceName, string relationshipName, string targetRoleName);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: The namespace name of the relationship property.
The name of the relationship. The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
The role name at the other end of the relationship.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The relationship name should not contain a namespace. If you add the namespace to the relationship name, for example '*MyNamespace*.*MyRelationship*', an error will occur.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format:
## Remarks The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
The name of the relationship is specified by the `Name` attribute of the `Association` element that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

remarks.format: ## Remarks The namespace of the relationship is specified by the `Namespace` attribute of the `Schema` element that contains the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

Docs.summary: Gets the role name at the other end of the relationship.
Docs.value: The target role name is specified by the attribute of the other element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
